entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Marshalling strings to unmanaged memory should provide a buffer length #81193
  • Consider fixing the "what dotnet process is this" problem #81191
  • [JIT] Possible optimization for `x % {pow2_cns}` transformation for `ulong` types #81189
  • createdump not running on segfault #81184
    8.0.0
  • Improve ConfigurationBinder performance with existing collections #81183
    Future
  • [.NET6 fix port] AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #81181
  • ILVerify fails to verify code that passes Nullable<T> to parameter with unmanaged constraint #81177
  • Consider adding IEqualityOperators<string, string, bool> to System.String #81173
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable symbolicating traces in Release builds #81172
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests` timing out on CI/linux #81170
    8.0.0
  • Include type names in InvalidCastException #81168
  • Missing mscordbi.dll 4.0.30319.0 from symbol servers #81167
  • Enabling a CPU profiler on Windows automatically enables ETW tracing and slows the app down by over 100x #81165
  • Redundant bound check "(uint)c > 'f' ? 0xFF : CharToHexLookup[c]" #81160
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesn't produce IL2109 - RUC on base type #81158
  • NativeAOT analysis - enable generation of warnings 2110, 2111, 2113 and 2115 #81156
  • GC crash in background_mark_simple1() #81154
  • SIGSEGV at `MethodTable::GetFlag` #81153
  • [API Proposal]: PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority>.Peek(out TPriority) #81152
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] ordering issue around ensuring static constructor execution #81151
  • ExecutionEngineException while debugging unit test #81148
  • [Tracking] CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute #81145
    8.0.0
  • Verify `TarWriter.TarEntry(fileName, entryName)` behavior if user owner and device numbers cannot be retrieved #81144
    8.0.0
  • Platform Specifications Should Match Casing Among All Build Scripts #81141
    8.0.0
  • `System.Collections.Specialized.Tests` crash `remainder by zero` with AOT/chrome #81138
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ILC error when using a function pointer type nested under a generic type #81117
  • [linux-musl-arm] paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failed in outerloop #81113
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Text.Ascii:ChangeCase' when JitDumping #81087
    8.0.0
  • Developers should have a more consistent experience when using System.Text.Json #63918
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json converter infrastructure improvements for .NET 8 #77018
    8.0.0
  • CLRRuntimeHost.GetCurrentAppDomainId fails #6802
    Future
  • TcpListener.LocalEndPoint property should really be IPEndPoint, not EndPoint #63117
    Future
  • VS2017 does not work with CMake files, EventPipe directory config is broken #12426
    Future
  • Incomplete writes on Unix #48479
    Future
  • NativeAOT and ILLink should fetch PDBs for inputs #81140
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot produces warning for generic instantiation which can't be suppressed #77455
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on method already marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #75898
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadOnlySequence overload for WriteRawValue #68223
    8.0.0
  • Regression with JsonConverter attribute with Syste.Text.Json 7 #80914
    7.0.x
  • Kestrel process creating multiple threads. #81149
  • dotnet-dump in container doesn't work due to ptrace restriction #80898
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort make methods virtual to allow overrides #77255
    Future
  • Dataflow crash while generating a warning about an assembly-level attribute #79833
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json unable to deserialize an object that implement IEnumerable but is itself not a list #81084
    Future
  • JIT: Improper handling of GC structs with undone promotion in tailcall-to-loop optimization #81081
    8.0.0
  • Q: Type 'IconBufferEventArgs' has a ComVisible(false) parent 'System.EventArgs' in its hierarchy, therefore QueryInterface calls for IDispatch or class interfaces are disallowed #80422
  • Erroneous `IOException` in `TarWriter.WriteEntry` on MacOS #81047
    8.0.0
  • Strange behavior when type matching on arrays of enums #81102

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: consolidate inlining code in fgInline.cpp #81198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Updating JitInterface to support Vector512. #81197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: build pred lists before patchpoint expansion #81196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable the /JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests #81195
    area-Meta
  • Fix a variety of issues in FrozenCollections #81194
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix max chunk size limiting #81192
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Change Source link version number refs to new properties #81190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix GC interfaces versioning #81188
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • Add Lerp to IFloatingPointIeee754 #81186
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] no posix socks emulation #81182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [mono][wasm] Avoid saving the result of OP_AOTCONST into the gc pin a… #81179
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Glossary: Change source for SoS to Wayback Machine link #81178
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix x86 clrgc loading #81176
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Debugging a racy test failing on CI #81166
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve -static-pie support #81163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize `HexConverter.FromChar` #81146
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Remove duplicate 'cmp' instruction in specific comparison scenario #81143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize compare to `HexConverter.FromChar` result #81142
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x

Merged

  • avoid allocation of SelectClientCertificate delegate #81096
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Build mono logging profiler on s390x #72049
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Change banana build to Release #81127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Beef up `WithoutFunctionPointerType` #81147
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix PAL exception SXS test #81169
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing case for upper save/restore #81091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable ExceptionTests due to issue #81170, to get CI green #81171
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow forced building of mobile manifest pkgs, outside mobile builds #80920
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure converter factories do not throw on unsupported types. #81133
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix tailcall-to-loop improper locals zeroing #81083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable ApiCompat ref<->src assembly validation #81104
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable Vector4.Dot #81130
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify getting full names for type loader purposes #81069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid GetConstructors in constraint validation #81068
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter jit calls #81071
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81070
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Move mono llvm fullaot runtime test leg to rolling build #81125
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix S.N.Vector4 related assert #81126
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Fix type check for PackedSimd.Splat #81100
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • BrowserDebugProxy: unify debug metadata reading for PE and Webcil #81099
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - X64 - Peephole optimization to possibly skip emitting `and reg, -1` #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use runtime ILLink.Tasks package instead of dotnet/linker #80764
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build issues #81074
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Always allocate when computing temp path #81085
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
